wxEcMath

0.6.3

wxEcMath is a tiny library to link to your software. It gives you the means to handle mathematical objects : expressions, curves, complex numbers and matrixes. The rich samples provided will help you to set up a new project very quickly.

The four main interests of wxEcMath are :

  • interesting features, principally the parser of mathematical expressions
  • multi-platform
  • support of ANSI and UNICODE
  • rich documentation and samples

The intended audience is developers and researchers.

To use the library, you must write your software using the wxWidgets framework. You must also be aware of the terms under which the library is released (see below).

  • Naming convention of the constants
  • Syntax to load a curve
